title: Intro
body:
Valkyria: Hello, Monrjiall. I'm a Valkyria.
Monrjiall: Hi... What is a "Valkyria"?
Valkyria: I'm supposed to take you to Valhalla as you are dead. But I'm afraid I can't do that.

[[What do you mean "you can't"?|Valkyria 1]]
[[I didn't want to go to Valhalla anyway.|Valkyria 2]]
[[You wretched witch! I will kill you!|Valkyria 3]]

title: Valkyria 1
body:
Valkyria: Unfortunately, no order has been given to take you to Valhalla and I suspect I know why...

[[Outro]]

title: Valkyria 2
body:
Valkyria: But you must! It is your destiny to reach the afterworld after dying in battle!

[[Outro]]

title: Valkyria 3
body:
Valkyria: Well, this is going nowhere, fast...

[[Outro]]

title: outro
body: Valkyria: I can help you reach Valhalla, but it will not be easy to accomplish.
